author: Riche Rifkind
comment: Great  design, but   can't  change  date  format,  support  is  disgusting and rude.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks Riche.  We will try to do better next time.

title: Nice but never  again

author: Marcus Abreu
comment: Works fine. Allow customizing. Looks great
title: Great

author: Nilam Kaushik
comment: I really like this multi time zone  watchface. I have family across continents and its great to keep track of time this way before calling them. Themes and colors choices are great to have, feels like I am wearing a new watch everyday. Keep it up devs.
title: Nice new addition of time zones

author: tyler jaeger
comment: I'm very very impressed.  This is the most fantastic feature rich smart watch watch face I've seen thus far.  So much customization.   Seriously  this face knocks it out of the park!  Homerun Forza!!!!!!!!!
title: Soooo FANTASTIC

author: Samual Smudge
comment: Not as expected.  One wonders if the Developers rated the watch face.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hey Samual - what seems to be the issue - how is it not as expected? If your unhappy with your purchase please give us the transaction ID and we can issue a refund, but would certainly like to hear how we can improve. forzaonestudios@gmail.com - Thanks!

author: Kelly Stewart
comment: Every time I tried to set it, I would go back to the face and it would say purchase. It didn't recognize that I bought it.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: We haven't heard from you Kelly, you have to go to Android Wear and set the face - then control settings via the installed app. If you still have issues please let us know - otherwise we can issue you a refund if you provide us your transaction ID. forzaonestudios@gmail.com

title: Can not set as face
